text: Apologies for the #powercut in #Wellington #TA21& surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 12:30. Geraint
Our apologies for a #powercut to customers affected in #Newport #NP20 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working on it and estimate to restore all supplies by 12:30 . Kirsten
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Newquay #TR8 #TR9 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Ellie

Our apologies for a #powercut to customers affected in #Newquay #TR8 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working on it and estimate to restore all supplies by 03:00. Ellie
All supplies to #Newport #NP44 #Cwmbran have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #Newport #NP44 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 22:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #S80 #Worksop area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Worksop #S80 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 20:00. Drew
